name: Les: The Horror Game
description:
The Les is a multiplayer cooperative horror game where you and a team of friends try to kill an ancient evil.

Max players for multiplayer: 4

Controls:
WASD/Arrows - Move
ALT+ENTER - Fullscreen/Window
Mouse click / Touch - Close the paper

Currently languages in the game:
English - Text & Dubbing
French - Text
Latin American Spanish - Text & Dubbing
Czech - Text & Dubbing
Slovak - Text
Polish - Text
Russian- Text

Version 0.04 changes:

-Released the game on Google Play
-Added buttons to change the region
-Added settings
-Ping will be visible
-Added new sounds
-Remade a player script about animations
-The main character has new and smoother animations
-Playing with a new character 
-If the Player had a name previous game the name will stay for the next games
-Added a button to join a random room
-Added fade between scenes
-New languages Slovak, Russian text and dubbing for Latin American Spanish

Discord: https://discord.gg/GvbBxFabjr

The game is still in development.
